system.description:
Whether a desktop or notebook model, a computer includes a keyboard, a mouse, a monitor, speakers (or headphones), a BW-RE/DVD-RW drive, a network card, and the latest processor. A character needs a computer to make Technology Use checks. Computers can also run software modules. Computers have two major areas of software module slot storage: RAM and Storage.

A tablet computer is a computer that consists of nothing but a touch screen. They interface completely wirelessly, and usually only contain two slots: the charging port which doubles as a data port and the headphone jack. They are significantly smaller than even the smallest of notebooks, and are extremely portable. You can purchase higher end models with more storage and RAM built in, but you can not upgrade tablet computers. Tablets can also be used to take pictures (at a -3 if using the Craft (Visual Art) skill), record sounds, use the internet and look up things (at a -4 if using the Technology Use Skill) and play music.

RAM: 1

Storage: 6
